data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of La Romana, Dominican Republic that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.location_label: Photo from the state of La Romana, Dominican Republic
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of La Romana to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of La Romana, Dominican Republic need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of La Romana, Dominican Republic to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Japanese people might believe through him.
Father, move the 23,825 believers in the state of La Romana to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of La Romana.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of La Romana.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
